@Me_Be_Trollin wrote:

TimeTM:

You and i both know that you just download underoath’s client. Umad??

Underoath didn’t dump half the data that’s posted in my client. He also didn’t have 610+ items loading, and HD characters. This is base off of the client released by “Clienthax” on R-S. So?

item.title: All American Pk || Project Insanity || Flawless Combat
item.dc:creator: @Me_Be_Trollin Me Be Trollin
item.description:
@Me_Be_Trollin wrote:

[quote=“Canownueazy, post:8, topic:376211”][quote author=I Vain I link=topic=472146.msg3452790#msg3452790 date=1293870338]
I know you haven’t stated this, and I believe you’re doing this by yourself, but if you ever need a hand with anything (Grand Exchange, forumlas, minigames, etc.) I wouldn’t mind helping you out.

(Canownyou would be better at the forumlas, cause he like writes them all on his wall or something. ^.^)
[/quote]Lol I notice more bugs/glitches then Scu11, and he admitted it

BTW you’re problem is you don’t have the 508 objects[/quote]

No I do, Jastizo and Netiznot are perfect with all the objects… When I dumped GrandExchange it was all fucked up. I’m thinking about just deleting the data, and making my own map region for the Grand Exchange :.[quote=“I Vain I”]I know you haven’t stated this, and I believe you’re doing this by yourself, but if you ever need a hand with anything (Grand Exchange, forumlas, minigames, etc.) I wouldn’t mind helping you out.

(Canownyou would be better at the forumlas, cause he like writes them all on his wall or something. ^.^)[/quote]

Thanks for the offer mate :). Really appreciate it

Read full topic

item.title: All American Pk || Project Insanity || Flawless Combat
item.dc:creator: @Me_Be_Trollin Me Be Trollin
item.description:
@Me_Be_Trollin wrote:

[quote=“Canownueazy, post:6, topic:376211”][quote author=Ix Soulcist xI link=topic=472146.msg3452701#msg3452701 date=1293862848]

That is quite a interesting picture, I guess it supports the Grand Exchange area obviously?

508 mapdata… Everything :)[quote author=I Vain I link=topic=472146.msg3452673#msg3452673 date=1293861067]
Graham and Blake helped with Project Insanity’s networking and core.

Ryan developed most of the content (packets handling, etc) and Sanity just added the shitcode ^.^

(Ryan = Lmctruck btw)

Anyway, good luck with this project.

lol… K
[/quote]
Nice… Nice, this looks great mate, I’m not too much of a fan for the 508 deobs. Though, I can give this one a exception. Good luck with the development.
[/quote]508 deobs?? The hell are you saying?

Anyway the map looks bad please don’t try loading stuff from other revisions if you’re not going to do it perfectly[/quote]

lol, I am doing it perfectly that was the most recent map I dumped. I’m about to add more information as well as other maps I put into the game. Gimmie a sec.

Read full topic
item.source: All American Pk || Project Insanity || Flawless Combat

item.title: All American Pk || Project Insanity || Flawless Combat
item.dc:creator: @Canownueazy Canownueazy
item.description:
@Canownueazy wrote:

[quote=“Ix Soulcist xI, post:5, topic:376211”][quote author=Me Be Trollin link=topic=472146.msg3452686#msg3452686 date=1293861731]

That is quite a interesting picture, I guess it supports the Grand Exchange area obviously?

508 mapdata… Everything :)[quote author=I Vain I link=topic=472146.msg3452673#msg3452673 date=1293861067]
Graham and Blake helped with Project Insanity’s networking and core.

Ryan developed most of the content (packets handling, etc) and Sanity just added the shitcode ^.^

(Ryan = Lmctruck btw)

Anyway, good luck with this project.
[/quote]

lol… K
[/quote]
Nice… Nice, this looks great mate, I’m not too much of a fan for the 508 deobs. Though, I can give this one a exception. Good luck with the development.[/quote]508 deobs?? The hell are you saying?

Anyway the map looks bad please don’t try loading stuff from other revisions if you’re not going to do it perfectly

And I’d like to see the “flawless combat” because if you didn’t edit the combat, then it isn’t perfect. Sanity’s combat is no where near “perfect”

[ul][]You can attack while you’re playing a defence animation"
[]You can switch weapons before the attack animation is over (meaning you can do a dds spec and instantly switch to whip so it looks like you’re dds specing with a whip)
[]Defender does defence anim when hit appears, not when attacker does attack anim
[]No 600ms delay for magic spells to appear
[]No hit stacking
[]Constructs projectiles as you play the pullback, not as soon as you fire, so sometimes projectiles fire from squares you’re not in when following/walking
[*]Much more wrong, but that’s all I’ve seen from the videos (oh and plus all the gs specs are not walkable which pisses me off)[/ul]

Read full topic
